Mr Eric Schmidt had been brought in to provide greater management experience to Google. He has been in the job for a decade and will become executive chairman. Google said Mr Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships . While President Bush and I had many discussions about the war preparations, I do not recall his ever asking me if I thought going to war with Iraq was the right decision, he writes.
